Stixbox Function

NAME

    rgeom - Random numbers from the geometric distribution

CALLING SEQUENCE

x=rgeom(n,p)

PARAMETERS

    • n : positive integer or vector [lig,col] of integers
    • p : probability
    • x : n-vector of random numbers chosen from geometric distribution

DESCRIPTION

    Random numbers from the geometric distribution P(X=k)=p(1-p)^k
